summary: Provides a Python wrapper for the ntthal command-line utility, exposing functions to compute melting temperatures of nucleic‑acid oligonucleotides and handling the underlying subprocess execution, with optional context‑manager support.
business_intent: Allow bioinformatics workflows and automation pipelines to programmatically obtain thermodynamic properties of DNA/RNA oligos by integrating ntthal directly into Python code, eliminating manual command‑line calls.
